properties.name: 200 / 1br - Charming Guest House for Rent
properties.description: Posted by DthomasHollywood Blvd. & Highland Ave., Los Angeles, CACute Unfurnished 1bd/1bath craftsman guest cottage. Great residential street, walking distance to Hollywood/Highland theaters and shopping. New interior/exterior paint, re-finished painted hardwood floors, and new landscaping . Kitchen comes with a fridge and a 50\'s style stove, plus a separate dining room. Hardwood floors and wood paneled walls throughout. Lots of closet space. Carport parking in driveway. There is a fenced front yard, and pets are welcome. 200 plus deposit. Available April 15th.

properties.name: 600 / 2br - Duplex in Hancock Park (Remodeled)
properties.description: Posted by Dthomas 1243 S. Muirfield, Los Angeles, CANicely remodeled duplex in Hancock Park Area. Both units are available for rent (2 bedroom + 1.5 bathroom each). Sun Deck located in backyard. Washer & Dryer hook-up. One block to a recreation park w/ many tennis courts & baseball field. Hardwood Floor in Living Room & Kitchen

properties.name: Atwater Village Farmers' Market
properties.description: Posted by Hundredflowers  3250 Glendale Blvd, los angeles, caThe Atwater Village Farmers\' Market features 12 farmers and 7 food vendors who bring a diverse selection of fresh fruits and vegetables as well as spices, sprouts, spreads, breads, meat, nuts, sweets and flowers each week. The market also hosts monthly events including cooking demonstrations, tastings, contests, children\'s activities and live entertainment. The Atwater Village market is open year round and serves the surrounding communities of Silverlake, Los Feliz, Glendale and Glassell Park. The market is located at 3250 Glendale Blvd., in the Wells Fargo Bank parking lot at Larga Ave. Day: Sunday Hours: 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.
